title: 更新版本1.0[圖形介面不用煩] 自動鋪路/鋪海底路/鋪橋 的命令自動生成工具
author: BillyPoon34
txt_content:
本帖最后由 BillyPoon34 于 2013-12-27 12:39 编辑 

新版本
連結:
dropbox.com/s/g4pts7qpix4s9lr/Minecraft%20Common%20Ridder%20Coder%20V%201.exe
1.0
新加功能
X軸 Z軸 四方都能編輯(建議不要試X軸, 因為礦車會開得太快, 不能完整生成, 這是MINECRAFT的問題, 不是這程式的問題)

語言包括 簡/繁中文/英文/日文 

在開始時能調效需要多少層或多少個方格,
預設為5*5*5,  最大上限為7*11*10

用了五日研究,寫了五千行ActionScipt
使用方法如下
這裡是生成器, 簡單旳換上, 然後複製就可
dropbox.com/s/l1zrw3xzm9nmvs2/Minecraft%20Common%20Ridder%20Coder%20V%200.swf
分兩次,先做刪水加鋪路, 後做正式輔路
imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1198x749q90/545/m7ej.png
imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1198x749q90/32/prsr.png
更新影片教學
youtube.com/watch?v=sbkqnblYTAE
imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1198x749q90/811/j174.png











使用方法:
A: -1表示不輸入, 0表示delect/填空 方塊 
B: 原本的設定, 你無法更改, 因為更改會令礦車不能鋪路
0: 有五個顏色盒, 由左至右表示前到後的鋪格層/前後次序,
1: 在其中一個方格的左下角/右上角選取, 選取了, 左上角會表示0,
2:在Input Matrial ID內全選更改你要用的方塊材質的數值, eg石: 1
3:輸入後按它, 便顯示你已輸入的ID
3.1在 Small Input Matrial ID內全選更改你要用的方塊材質的數值, eg: 11(藍色玻璃的細數字)
3.2輸入後按它, 便顯示你已輸入的細ID
4 當你重複地用1-4的步驟輸入你要用的ID, 按它輸出指令,
5在這裡CTRL+A複製到Mincraft內的命令方塊,
6在按下Trace後,表示你餘下可選取的方格數
7清除所有, 重新設定, 序設/没有輸入任何的方塊ID,已加入基本使礦車向前鋪路走的指令, 請放心加要用的ID

(未加功能, 你不能因按錯, 在3/3.2輸入-1來取消, 必須重設才可)

這裡是例子:
刪水加鋪路
summon MinecartCommandBlock ~-2 ~ ~ {Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~0 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~-1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~2 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~0 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~-1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~0 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~2 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~0 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~3 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~0 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~0 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~0 ~0 50"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 157"},Command:"setblock ~ ~-2 ~2 152"}

正式輔路
summon MinecartCommandBlock ~-2 ~ ~ {Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~ ~1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~ ~2 ~1 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~1 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~1 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~2 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~2 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 157"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~0 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~0 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~1 0"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~ ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~ ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~-1 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~-1 ~ 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~-2 ~0 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-1 ~-2 ~0 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~2 ~-2 ~0 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~-2 ~-2 ~0 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~1 ~ ~ 50"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~-2 ~-1 98"},id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~-1 66"},Command:"setblock ~ ~-2 ~2 152"}﻿
